title: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Practicum in Hospitality and Tourism

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental hospitality and tourism industry theories, marketing principles, and basic service management
context.additional_context: Conducting project-based assessments in a constrained technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Designing innovative problem-solving approaches applicable to real-world hospitality scenarios.
Developing marketing strategies incorporating theoretical foundations and ethical considerations.
Conducting interdisciplinary collaborative projects through analysis of diverse stakeholders

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
